00047 /*
00048  * Read the file contents into the data object.
00049  */
00050 void GridControlFileReader::Read(const std::string &fileName, GridControlData& data)
00051 {
00052         // Clear the old data and read the file.
00053         data.Clear();
00054         GenericFileReader reader;
00055         GenericData gdata;
00056         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00057         reader.ReadHeader(gdata);
00058 
00059         // Check the file identifier
00060         if (gdata.FileIdentifier() != GRD_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER)
00061         {
00062                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00063                 throw e;
00064         }
00065 
00066         // Get the header parameters.
00067         ParameterNameValueType param;
00068         gdata.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(GRD_ROWS_PARAMETER_NAME, param);
00069         data.SetRows(param.GetValueInt32());
00070         gdata.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(GRD_COLUMNS_PARAMETER_NAME, param);
00071         data.SetColumns(param.GetValueInt32());
00072 
00073         // Get the XY coordinates from the dataSets.
00074         FeatureCoordinate coord;
00075         u_int16_t x;
00076         u_int16_t y;
00077         int nRows;
00078         DataSet *dataSet;
00079 
00080         // First the B1 probes.
00081         dataSet = gdata.DataSet(GRD_FILE_COORDINATE_GROUP_NAME, GRD_FILE_B1_SET_NAME);
00082         if (dataSet->Open() == false)
00083         {
00084                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00085                 throw e;
00086         }
00087         nRows = dataSet->Rows();
00088         data.ResizeB1(nRows);
00089         for (int iRow=0; iRow<nRows; iRow++)
00090         {
00091                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 0, x);
00092                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 1, y);
00093                 coord.x = x;
00094                 coord.y = y;
00095                 data.SetB1(iRow, coord);
00096         }
00097         dataSet->Close();
00098         dataSet->Delete();
00099 
00100         // Next the B2 probes.
00101         dataSet = gdata.DataSet(GRD_FILE_COORDINATE_GROUP_NAME, GRD_FILE_B2_SET_NAME);
00102         if (dataSet->Open() == false)
00103         {
00104                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00105                 throw e;
00106         }
00107         nRows = dataSet->Rows();
00108         data.ResizeB2(nRows);
00109         for (int iRow=0; iRow<nRows; iRow++)
00110         {
00111                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 0, x);
00112                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 1, y);
00113                 coord.x = x;
00114                 coord.y = y;
00115                 data.SetB2(iRow, coord);
00116         }
00117         dataSet->Close();
00118         dataSet->Delete();
00119 
00120         // Last the NS probes.
00121         dataSet = gdata.DataSet(GRD_FILE_COORDINATE_GROUP_NAME, GRD_FILE_NS_SET_NAME);
00122         if (dataSet->Open() == false)
00123         {
00124                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00125                 throw e;
00126         }
00127         nRows = dataSet->Rows();
00128         data.ResizeNS(nRows);
00129         for (int iRow=0; iRow<nRows; iRow++)
00130         {
00131                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 0, x);
00132                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 1, y);
00133                 coord.x = x;
00134                 coord.y = y;
00135                 data.SetNS(iRow, coord);
00136         }
00137         dataSet->Close();
00138         dataSet->Delete();
00139 }
